Summary: We saw a triangular shaped light above and in between 2 blinking light towers and it stayed in the same spot for 15 mins., then moved slowly and began to blink all sorts of colors as it got closer, heading west then turning south.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in New Albany
There was one other sighting in New Albany on or around February 20th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the dining table looking out towards west when i noticed what i thought was an unusually bright star.I grabbed the binoculars and i watched it for about 15 minutes.My husband saw it too.As i looked at it through binoculars i could see that it appeared to be a lit up triangle shaped craft.As it began to move very slowly west, i got my shoes and coat on to go outside to see it better,but when i got outside it was gone.there were a few airplanes in the area after that,much higher in altitude though but they don't light up bright white or appear in any way a triangle,and they also blink their anti-collision lights.So i don't know what it was,only what i saw from where i was at.I was outside at exactly 7:30-7:35pm.
